useCase.name: Access Images Information
useCase.description: Allow the Donor Representative to access and view descriptive information about images on the website.

preconditions.precondition: The Donor Representative is authenticated and logged in on the website.

successEndConditions.condition: The Donor Representative viewed the descriptive information about the images successfully.

useCase.trigger: The Donor Representative chooses to access image descriptive information.

mainSequence.step: User Interface receives the access request.
Authorization System authenticates the Donor Representative.
Donor Representative requests image descriptive information.
Database returns metadata for the images.
File Management displays the descriptive information.
User Interface shows the descriptive information about the images to the Donor Representative.
